title: Should I Stay Gazelle Intense After Paying Off Debt? (Hour 1)
description:
Dave Ramsey & Kristina Ellis discuss:

Buying company stock,

Staying gazelle intense in baby steps 4-6.

Inheriting a million dollars,

Renting vs. buying.


Support Our Sponsor:

DreamCloud

PODS Moving & Storage
